title: API Gateway REST API to invoke Amazon Connect Task
description: Create an API Gateway REST API that is protected with a Lambda token authorizer and integrates with AmazonSQS

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK project demonstrates integration with Amazon Connect by invoking API Gateway endpoints. Many Connect customers would want to invoke adhoc tasks for their connect agents. These contact center agents can then perform subsequent task based on the actions listed in this task

bullets.text: AWS Solutions Construct for Amazon Connect

text: See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
